body: I need a translation of this shit right now ;v

Basic translation: Chiaki is cannonicly dead throughout the whole danganronpa 2 game. She died way back and is AI inside the game, which is also killed by monokuma. Once outside the game world Izuru hinata realizes that he'll never truly be able to be with chiaki again. . . .unless he makes another AI and puts her in a new simulation or something. Sad shit
The reason hinata was screaming at the end is because monokuma bited that poor guy's dick and chiaki was making fun of it
Not to be weird but i agree with you otakufaithyy a translation would be nice

I cried. I didn't come here for that.. wtf
I really need a translation because i cried without even understanding, i will most likely cry even more with translation tho.....
I really wish I could read this since it seems quite emotional at the end, oh well, great nonetheless
Too bad it's in japanese, but Chiaki's doujins are always welcome.
